name: April
tagline: Reach Inbox Zero by speaking with your email & calendar
description: April is a voice AI Executive Assistant that manages your email and calendar handsfree. Built for busy individuals who need an EA. Using just your voice you can ask April to reschedule meetings, delete junk email and respond to emails that matter.

name: Chance AI for Android
tagline: Curiosity Lens: Your Visual Agent
description: Chance AI is a curiosity lens for life. Point your camera and the world opens—not with ads or noise, but with meaning. It’s the first visual agent that helps your eyes think—so you can see deeper, feel closer, and carry wonder into every day.

name: Eleven Music API
tagline: First Music API trained on licensed data, commercial-ready
description: You can now integrate the highest quality AI music into your products and workflows. Since launch, creators have generated over 750k songs with Eleven Music.

name: Fei
tagline: Production grade vibe coding
description: Introducing Fei. The production grade, vibe coding, autonomous engineer. Designed for teams that build real products. Fei works in your codebase, uses your components, maintains design system and coding standards, delivering real, production grade code.

name: Filtro
tagline: Your Product Hunt Filter
description: Having a hard time scanning through the product lists? Some product types are not of your interest? You can filter those out using Filtro - Your Product Hunt Filter!

name: AI Transcribe
tagline: Easily transcribe & translate lectures and meetings
description: AI Transcribe converts speech to text with unmatched accuracy + smart post-processing. Beyond transcription: create mindmaps, flashcards and chat with your notes. Affordable, student-friendly, and powerful.

name: GPT Burger
tagline: From endless scrolling to one-click bookmarks in GPT
description: From endless scrolling to one-click bookmarks in GPT. - RickyHoHo/GPT-Burger

name: TinyRoll
tagline: Your camera roll is a mess, but TinyRoll let's you clean it
description: TinyRoll – the easiest (and most oddly satisfying) way to organize your photos and free up space. Swipe left to delete, swipe right to keep. Swipe down to add to an album, swipe up to share.

name: Opal
tagline: Finally on Android: the world’s favorite screen time app.
description: Opal helps you reclaim time and focus by blocking distracting apps and tracking your screen time. Loved by millions of iOS users (200+ million hours saved), it’s finally on Android to help you take control of your phone.

name: Talk to Dai (Day)
tagline: Learn any language or dialect through humanlike conversation
description: Hi everyone I made Day, or Dai, because talktoday.com has been under construction for years now. I made this for people who want to learn a language but can't stand another language learning game or flashcards.

name: Vagus+
tagline: Activate your vagus nerve with cardiac coherence
description: Vagus+ is a fully customizable cardiac coherence app that helps you easily activate your vagus nerve. Available on the App Store for iPhone and iPad, in English and French.

name: WriteRush 2.0
tagline: The writing app that feels like a game
description: Writerush uses writing effects, progress tracking, and a distraction-free UI to make building your daily writing habit fun and genuinely addictive.

name: Travel Bug
tagline: Transform every travel gem from TikTok/IG into pins on a map
description: 1. Share video to Travel Bug Share any TikTok or Instagram travel video directly to the app 2. We detect & tag all locations Our AI automatically identifies every place mentioned and creates location pins 3. View a map of all the locations saved

name: Fume
tagline: Get Playwright tests from a Loom video
description: Fume is your AI QA team. Describe what you want to test with a single Loom video and Fume will create Playwright browser tests for you. Tests will automatically run twice-a-day on our cloud and will be maintained automatically!

name: Chord Mini
tagline: Chord recognition and beat tracking with llm
description: An open-source tool that uses deep learning models and LLM to analyze songs and provide: Chord recognition, Guitar chord diagrams, Beat tracking and synchronized chord progression visualization Compatible with YouTube links and direct audio uploads.

name: Phygital+ AI Design Canvas
tagline: Create AI pipelines that deliver your style, every time.
description: Phygital+ unites 30+ powerful AI models. From image generators to logo makers, video tools, upscalers, and more into one workspace. Consistent, on-brand results in one place.

name: ScanSocial
tagline: Know Which Socials a Number Uses
description: Scan Social lets you instantly check which social media platforms are linked to any phone number. Quickly uncover a number’s online presence in seconds.

name: CrawlChat
tagline: AI Chatbot for your documentation and support
description: Make AI chatbot from your help documentation that answers your customer and client queries and connect it to your website, Discord server, Slack workspace or distribute it as a MCP server. In return view the analytics that help you fix data gaps and more!

name: Butter Reader
tagline: Turn your blog posts into engaging audio
description: Add AI-powered audio players to any website in minutes. Your readers can listen to your content while multitasking, making your blog more accessible and engaging than ever before.

name: GenAIntel
tagline: Compare 40+ AI Video Models! Showcase & Share Instantly
description: Stop guessing which AI video model is best. GenAIntel runs one prompt across 40+ models and shows results side-by-side on an infinite canvas. Compare apples-to-apples, showcase your picks, and share a single link.
